description:
Our place is close to Pratt Institute and Fort Greene Park. You’ll love our place because of the neighborhood, the kitchen, the comfy beds, the outdoors space, and the light. Our place is good for couples,  business travelers, and families (with kids).

Beautiful duplex in a brownstone located in the heart of Brooklyn. Close to transportation, restaurants, Fort Green park and 30 min to the city

Guest can access the whole duplex and the back yard

We are not going to be there but can be reached through text, email or a phone call at anytime
name: Brooklyn Duplex in a beautiful brownstone
review: My family had a marvelous time staying at Shay & Anat's beautifully decorated and spacious home.  It was like living in a lifestyle magazine but we were never worried that our kids would damage anything -- it's not precious.  The subway station is really close.  There are good restaurants nearby.  The kitchen is well equipped with everything from a standing mixer to a sausage maker!
